content: cut the c3 yarn turn 2 3 4 side of rainbow take c4 row 7 2 single_crochet repeat increase 3 single_crochet *6 1 single_crochet turn 33 row 8 33 single_crochet cut the yarn wrong side side of rainbow weave in ends on the wrong side crochet the second side like as the first right side assembly 2 3 scin the corner 1 3 take c1 yarn fold 2 parts right side out mark with markers 5 loops in the middle of the upper part of the rainbow 4 5 crochet single_crochet along the edge through both layers at the corner loop of the rainbow crochet 3 single_crochet from one stitch without tying 10 loops to the end put a filler and a ball into the rattle we do not fill too much the toy should be soft don t cut the yarn 1 ring holder 1 2 continue with c1 yarn row 1 5 single_crochet turn row 2-14 5 single_crochet turn row 15 5 single_crochet cut the yarn with long tail 3 insert wooden ring sew to the rainbow weave in ends enjoy your choose other colors and create rattles rainbow baby baby will be delighted rattle 15 should you have any questions please contact contact me for assistance e-mail info crochetclub@gmail com find me https //www crochetclub store/ my shop on etsy my shop on ravelry my shop on crazypatterns share your work follow along on instagram at @crochetclubstore tag @crochetclubstore and use the #crochetclubstore hashtag to show off your new project join me on youtube join me on my creative journey and subscribe to my youtube channel сlick to link https //www youtube com/@crochetclubstore 16 more patterns from crochetclubstore baby hat bonnet & mittens bags baby sneakers & socks baby rattles & loveys 17
